name: Arc Solutions Canada
tag_list: kitchener, wateroo, network, voice, telephony, firewall, projects, design, security, connecting, experts, cisco, mcafee, checkpoint, sharepoint, microsoft, routers, switches, core, nexus, telecommunications, experts-at-the-right-price, perfect-deployment
overview:
The Power to Connect

We design, implement, and support your network infrastructure. Why Use Us!

All employees were chosen due to their passion for technology as a life interest. The most important characteristic though was the need to make their work speak for itself through the client’s appreciation.

We specialize in Cisco deployments that are complimented by the best security software, and virtualized sever farms. We will add many specialized devices to enable such options as SSL/VPN or load balancing network traffic via Citrix Netscaler.

We have been at this for years. Serving the GTA and Kitchener/Waterloo/Cambridge Region. Give us a chance to show you how our enthusiam and expertise can make your transition to higher tech a smooth and happy experience.

Services

Cisco Routers/Switches all series Enterprise or Express VoIP Cisco Platforms/Build Custom Auto Attendants for Cisco Unity/Connection/Express Top availability network design VPN/Firewall deployments Citrix/VMWare Virtualized servers Sharepoint/Exchange deployment Complete documentation and training of all network solutions

Specialties

Enabling features for clients without adding any costs Producing a network road map that is reliable and feasible for their future needs Cabling voice lines/punching and making sure no telecom request is required Configuring exactly what the clients need based on our directional information Supporting the client after UAT testing at no-charge to help with tweaks during the 1st week of adoption Proposing a tiered solution : Bronze/Silver/Gold - while keeping cost in mind
